text: Qasim Akhgar, was a Hazara writer, researcher, activism and theorists from Afghanistan. Qasim Akhgar, was born in 1951 in Kabul, Afghanistan. He died after an illness in 2013 in Kabul, Afghanistan. == References == Category:Hazara people Category:1951 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Qasim Akhgar
